sentences.en: Changes in student enrollment have catalyzed the education system.
sentences.cn: 学生入学人数的改变已经对教育体系产生催化作用.

sentences.en: Class enrollment, where each student has all of the course schedule selections, each student having his own bucket in the CGTT.
sentences.cn: 班级入学，每个学生都有所有的课程安排选择，每个学生都将自己的选择放在 CGTT 中。

sentences.en: EEOC is abbreviated from the Enrollment Expansion of Colleges.
sentences.cn: 扩招是指学校扩大招生规模.本文所谓扩招,特指高等教育扩大招生规模.

sentences.en: Enrollment has fallen off this year.
How much is the tuition ( enrollment fee )?
Low primary enrollment typically reflects low participation by poor people.
sentences.cn: 这样低的小学入学率典型的是反映了贫困孩子入学的情况.

sentences.en: Participants will receive a Case Presentation Registration Form after enrollment.
sentences.cn: 参加者将在报名后收到[个案发表登记表].

sentences.en: Student enrollments have more than doubled.
sentences.cn: 学生注册人数翻了一倍多。

sentences.en: Students Enrollment of Institutions of Higher Education ( 10000 persons )
sentences.cn: 高等学校在校学生 ( 万人 )

sentences.en: The baby boom created a bulge in school enrollment.
sentences.cn: 生育高峰造成学校入学人数的暴涨.

sentences.en: The full fee is payable on enrollment.
sentences.cn: 所有费用在注冊时缴付.

sentences.en: There has been a decline in enrollment in liberal arts courses in favor of highly specialized training for high-paying careers, mostly in business.
sentences.cn: 文科课程的报名人数有所下降，而以商业为主、针对高薪职业的高度专业化培训课程则越来越受欢迎。

sentences.en: Translated Description : accounting training. Tax training classes are real account enrollment!
sentences.cn: 会计培训. 财税实账班培训正在招生!

sentences.en: With the acceleration of higher education, college enrollment expansion of the scale.
sentences.cn: 随着高等教育大众化进程的加速, 高等学校招生规模的扩大.

sentences.en: You will be given a reading list at enrollment.
sentences.cn: 注册时你会收到一份阅读书目.

words.tran_cn: 入学者；入会者；被征入伍者
参加；登记；注册；记入名册
登记；使加入；把...记入名册；使入伍

trans.tran_cn: 登记，注册（人数），入会，入学，入伍
trans.tran_en: the number of people who have arranged to join a school, university, course etc
